resources.string: Eligius is a non-profit development with the goal of helping new people enter the crypto space. Eligius allows users to manage their cryptocurrency portfolio and keep track of prices and the valuation of their portfolio.
Portfolio management is a hard skill to learn, but Eligius helps you keep an eye on things!
Again, Eligius is a non-profit app which means we host our databases with our own funds. It would be greatly appreciated however if you could spare us a donation for the upkeep of the app!
You can donate to us by clicking the button below!
With your donation, Eligius can maintain the app and our databases which makes all of this possible!
